title: Himi 628
lyrics:
11 & 10
1.
Sīsū, he ‘Eiki ‘o ‘emau mo’ui
‘Afio mai ka mau fai tukupā:
Te mau taukave Ho’ tu’utu’uni,
Mau mateaki pē ki Ho huafa.
‘Eiki Sihova, mohu kelesi,
‘Omi ha ivi ke tokoni mai.
Te mau ikuna ‘a e tau ‘a Heli,
Tā ‘uluafi he tau ‘o ka fai.
2.
Loa ‘emau nofo ‘o lata māmani,
Tuli ke ma’u hono ngaahi mālie:
Tau tu’ā fanga ho’ ‘ofa fungani,
Mole mo ia he lelei fulipē.
‘Eiki Sihova, etc.
3.
Mā homau loto he’emau manatu,
Taimi ne mole he fai fakalusa:
Mei tu’utamaki kae taukave atu;
Mālo ne tuai he ha’u ‘a Nunu’a
‘Eiki Sihova, etc.
4.
Faifai ‘o hoko ‘a e ‘Aho lahi na,
Fotu ‘a e ‘Eiki he’emau mo’ui!
Toki toloto he fu’u monu’ia,
Ulo ‘a e Maama he loto po’uli.
‘Eiki Sihova, etc.
5.
Si’i Sīsū e, kuo lava Ho’ ‘ofa,
‘Ofa ne fai ki he palakū fau.
Te mau li’oa ma’a e ‘Afiona,
Nofo ‘o tali Ho’ ngaahi fekau.
‘Eiki Sihova, mohu kelesi,
‘Omi ha ivi ke tokoni mai.
Te mau ikuna ‘a e tau ‘a Heli,
Tā ‘uluafi he tau ‘o ka fai. *
C.P.W.B
